title: Removes provisions relating to income and duration of the STAR exemption for eligible senior citizens; repealer
summary: Removes provisions relating to income eligibility threshold and duration of the STAR exemption for eligible senior citizens.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to the duration of the exemption and income level of eligible senior citizens for purposes of the school tax relief (STAR) exemption and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating to the income level of senior citizens eligible for such exemption
